About me

Whoami?

My story

Hi! I am a 23 y/o Slovak guy, who likes to code. I began to be interested in programming in high school, where I had a Java professor. In 4th year of high school I have found that Unity exists and began to work with it. Created some simple games and learnt C#. Later on college I learnt C and little bit of Java. I learnt C++. In 2017 I was asked to program a Gopnik Simulator, and I thought "Sure, this will be great experience". And so I did it. I had lot of time so I began to learn MERN stack, JavaScripts and mastered CRM. Later I though: "Alright. Time to move to full-time developer". So I did that. Now I am creating react applications and plugins to CRM - in C#. I am keen to learn new technologies. We gotta move forward, as fast as the IT world is.

Various restaurants & pubs

Barman

In my early years before college I worked in several restaurants as a part-timer. There I learned how to be patient and how to talk to customers.
